# ch-grid-footer

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Properties

| Property                    | Attribute                      | Description                                                                        | Type     | Default |
| --------------------------- | ------------------------------ | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ------- |
| `activePage`                | `active-page`                  | The active page                                                                    | `number` | `1`     |
| `maxVisiblePaginationItems` | `max-visible-pagination-items` | The max. number of visibile pages pagination (first and last page are not counted) | `number` | `3`     |
| `pageDots`                  | `page-dots`                    | The page number where dots should be inserted                                      | `number` | `null`  |
| `paginationItems`           | `pagination-items`             | The number of pages pagination                                                     | `number` | `1`     |

## Events

| Event                    | Description | Type               |
| ------------------------ | ----------- | ------------------ |
| `paginationSelectedPage` |             | `CustomEvent<any>` |
